summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Savon de Marseille, Jasmine fragrance, 5.3 Oz Bar soap, Marius Fabre
Review Date: 2014/11/14
Store: Marius Fabre
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Marius Fabre', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '5.3 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HB150JA'}
Review Text: The bar is rather small..but the jasmine is overly pungent! In a good way..I'm wondering could it be chemically enhanced? Most jasmine's are rather light in nature. Regardless this bar is for a special occasion like my birthday 2015
Review Title: blooms in jasmine
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Optimum Salon Haircare Damage Antidote Oil Moisturizer 8.5 oz
Review Date: 2015/02/11
Store: Soft-Sheen Carson
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Material Type Free': 'Aluminum Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Soft-Sheen Carson', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.5 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332133307 796433040804 075285008492 784190441354'}
Review Text: I bought this product last year in 2014 at a local CVS pharmacy store. I like this product but I must warn African females (black) this product does leave a residue..so if you use this lotion daily..always brush your hair out. From the scalp to the ends...it reminds me of the "jerri curl" products from the 1980's. Over all my hair did not dry out and it stayed moisturized for atleast 2-3 before re-applying. If you use a pressing comb or hot curling iron dont mix this product with heat..if you desire a Donna Summers look this is perfect..
Review Title: Better than a perm any day..
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Venezia Soapworks Moisturizing Soap Rose - 7oz
Review Date: 2015/02/25
Store: Venezia
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Venezia', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.8 x 1.7 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '796433748755 895697010100 787461525142'}
Review Text: This bar I purchased because I wanted to collect a rose scented bar from this company. When I'm in a mood for "florals" I scan amazon for certain scents of soaps. The reviews were reasonable regarding this brand. Only time will tell will I repeat my purchase.
Review Title: A little piece of italy...I think?
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Asquith & Somerset ROSE GARDEN 10.5 Oz Perfumed Bath Soap, Gift Wrapped, imported from England
Review Date: 2015/03/20
Store: Asquith & Somerset
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Asquith & Somerset', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.7 x 1.4 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '784179663692'}
Review Text: I have used Asquith & Somerset bath products since 2010. Top tier luxury soap makers along side Caswell & Massey. This bar was purchased as a gift for a relative.
Review Title: Royalty...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Calgon Massaging Beauty Bar - English Garden: 2 Bars
Review Date: 2015/04/17
Store: Calgon
Product Description: ["CALGON take me away! Wrap your skin in luxury with these unique beauty bars specifically formulated to cleanse, nourish and massage the skin with hydrating lotion. The creamy lather leaves skin soft, smooth and clean while the massage bumps help exfoliate and improve body's micro-circulation. Skin feels refreshed and moisturized all day long. Discover English Garden: A romantic bouquet of flowers that captures the essence of moonlit strolls in a lush, enchanted garden. 2 - 4.25 OZ ("]
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Calgon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.8 x 2.8 x 3 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '815890010103', 'UPC': '815890010103', 'Manufacturer': 'Calgon'}
Review Text: I love Calgon bath products...the scents are delicious and you feel like you've died & gone to heaven. The soaps are very creamy and leave you squeeky clean.
Review Title: Calgon ....!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Michel Design Works Bath Soap Bar, Peony, Large
Review Date: 2015/10/14
Store: Michel Design Works
Product Description: ['This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 3 x 2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL227', 'UPC': '608666691299', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'}
Review Text: I purchased the Hummingbird scent and I currently own three scents from Michel.. The Peony is really a good scent and the scent is just wonderful. The bars are really big and the lather is just infectious so I recommend that you buy a bar for bathing. You can also give one of these as a gift if you so choose? My Tutti Fruiti arrived today as well and the smell is another top favorite..
Review Title: Michel Design works really does a body good
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bundle of 2 Greenwich Bay Trading Co. Soaps - 10.5oz Bath Soap Bar and Matching 1.9oz Hand Soap Bar (Passion Flower and Olive Oil)
Review Date: 2015/10/20
Store: Greenwich Bay Trading Company
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Greenwich Bay Trading Company', 'Unit Count': '12.4 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 4 x 3 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332243488 617633902047'}
Review Text: What more can I say about my purchase of Greenwich Bay Trading bath bar set? First of all these soap sets were on my Wish-list for sometime. They arrived today and just like they are pictured...The big bar is truly huge..! Reminds me of a container of butter that you find in the super market. The scents are very nice and they arrived un broken or switched out due to a shortage in shipping. The larger bar I will use sometime next year and the smaller one will go in my soap bowl,that I plan on using this weekend.
Review Title: Finally sitting on the dock of the Bay..
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Commonwealth Argan Oil Moisturizing Bath Bar 12 Oz Boxed by CST
Review Date: 2015/12/29
Store: Commonwealth Soap & Toiletries
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Commonwealth Soap & Toiletries', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1'}
Review Text: I bought this bar of soap as a gift for my hair stylist and I have used Common Wealth bar soaps in the past. They normally keep them at hotels like Marriot,Hilton or other 3 star lodge's. I purchased  a Cotton,Pineapple from Amazon and the Sugar scented one's from their company website...The bars are really big and they last for more than a month or more. They make a wonderful gift and certain scent's have a special box that encases the soaps..
Review Title: A gift...in deed
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Castelbel Porto Tropical Garden Luxury Bath Bar 10.5 Oz Gift Wrapped
Review Date: 2016/01/06
Store: Castelbel Porto
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.6 x 1.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '737488213553'}
Review Text: I bought this bar as a Christmas gift for a relative..I have used this brand in the past. The packaging is rather fancy but the scents are so delicious . They remind me of cocktails they serve in the Hawaiian islands..The bars are a full size 10.5 oz and you can share these with a male spouse. Most male's tend to avoid scented soaps especially if they linger? To bad I didn't buy this one for myself but my cousin should enjoy this soap. Maybe she will return the favor and buy me the same brand? Lol
Review Title: Taking a cruise...in the Hawaiian islands
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CST Commonwealth Honeysuckle 12 Oz Bar Soap Boxed
Review Date: 2016/02/17
Store: Commonwealth Soap & Toiletries
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Commonwealth Soap & Toiletries', 'Scent': 'Honeysuckle', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '12.0 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 3.5 x 1.8 inches; 11.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '795827695491 633643974775 789533878668'}
Review Text: Common wealth has really impressed me with these new scents that they have created..Yes I am very GUILTY for my obsessive purchasing from the Common wealth line..I honestly prefer bar soaps over liquid soap..because a nice big bar with a tender aroma ease's my nerve's after a very long day of working...Honeysuckle doesn't smell very strong at all..but it doesn't matter. Because like my hubby says you probably won't use that bar until 2020..Lol
Review Title: A nice scent...BIG bar
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

I purchased  a Cotton,Pineapple from Amazon and the Sugar scented one's from their company website...The bars are really big and they last for more than a month or more. They make a wonderful gift and certain scent's have a special box that encases the soaps..
Review Title: A gift...in deed
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: I bought this bar as a Christmas gift for a relative..I have used this brand in the past. The packaging is rather fancy but the scents are so delicious . They remind me of cocktails they serve in the Hawaiian islands..The bars are a full size 10.5 oz and you can share these with a male spouse. Most male's tend to avoid scented soaps especially if they linger? To bad I didn't buy this one for myself but my cousin should enjoy this soap. Maybe she will return the favor and buy me the same brand? Lol

Review Text: Common wealth has really impressed me with these new scents that they have created..Yes I am very GUILTY for my obsessive purchasing from the Common wealth line..I honestly prefer bar soaps over liquid soap..because a nice big bar with a tender aroma ease's my nerve's after a very long day of working...Honeysuckle doesn't smell very strong at all..but it doesn't matter. Because like my hubby says you probably won't use that bar until 2020..Lol

        [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience reflects a consistent appreciation for high-quality bath products. They particularly enjoy rich, luxurious scents and effective moisturizing properties across various soap bars. The fragrance of jasmine and rose, in particular, stands out as a favorite, emphasizing the user’s preference for floral aromas. Products from certain brands are noted for their creamy lather and long-lasting quality, contributing to a sense of indulgence. Positive recollections are often tied to personal occasions, such as birthdays, enhancing the sentimental value of their purchases. Reviews indicate a strong inclination towards gifting, highlighting the appealing packaging and thoughtful presentation of these items.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite generally positive feedback, the user has expressed some concerns regarding specific products. One such issue is a noticeable residue left on hair when using a particular moisturizing oil, leading to cautious usage recommendations. Additionally, there are hints of dissatisfaction with some scents, perceived to be overly strong or chemically enhanced. There is a clear trend of searching for products with a balanced fragrance profile, as excessive potency can detract from the overall experience. Lastly, certain products were critiqued for not living up to expectations, suggesting the user approaches new brands with a discerning perspective.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchasing behavior showcases a strong preference for quality bath products, particularly those with pleasing floral scents and moisturizing benefits. Positive experiences highlight the luxury of brands that meet these criteria and the enjoyment of gifting these items. However, some negative aspects, such as concerns about residue and fragrance strength, reveal a critical side to their evaluations. This balanced perspective illustrates a shopper who values both performance and sensory experiences, continually seeking products that fulfill their personal and gifting needs while remaining vigilant against disappointing purchases.

target_interaction.title: New scents
target_interaction.text: I love Michel Design bar soaps...The scents are so yummy smelling and they have been a frequent purchase of mine for 3 years! I have written many reviews regarding my purchase of their assorted scents.. The packaging is so pretty...and they make perfect bridal,birthday and anniversary gifts..
target_interaction.title_meta: Michel Design Works Oversized Triple Milled Bath Soap Bar, Magnolia, Large, 8.7 Ounce
features: Triple-milled soap made of pure vegetable palm oil and glycerin
An irresistible scent of romantic white magnolias
Combine with Michel Design Works coordinated soaps, lotions, journals, and trays to create a unique, personalized gift sure to be used and appreciated
description: This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.
